instruction: 请使用excel制作报价单模板，包含报价单标题、报价单位信息、产品明细表格、合计金额和备注条款等完整结构，并使用合并单元格美化格式
method: Create a quote sheet template in Excel with merged cells for formatting. Step 1: Add the title '报价单' (Quote Sheet) at the top center, merge cells G15:H15 for the title. Step 2: Add header fields including '报价单位:' (Quote Unit), '联系人:' (Contact Person), '联系电话:' (Contact Phone), '客户名称:' (Customer Name), '报价日期:' (Quote Date), '邮箱:' (Email). Step 3: Create a product details table with column headers: '序号' (Serial No.), '产品名称' (Product Name), '产品类型' (Product Type), '规格' (Specification), '数量' (Quantity), '单价' (Unit Price), '金额' (Amount), '备注' (Remarks). Pre-fill serial numbers 1-6 in column C (rows 19-24). Step 4: Add summary section with '合计金额(小写)' (Total Amount in numbers) and '合计金额(大写)' (Total Amount in Chinese characters). Step 5: Add remarks/terms section with numbered points for validity period, delivery address, shipping method, payment method, and signature. Merge cells for the '备注' label. Step 6: Add footer fields for '报价人:' (Quoter) and '审批:' (Approval). Format the table with borders and proper alignment using merged cells where appropriate.
